name: Bulkops app
description: Bulk operations app for Jira is a cloud based add-on, which helps in performing bulk operational features not available on Jira cloud.

SECRET_KEY.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies.

SECURITY_SALT.description: A security key for user authentication after they've registered an account.

QUEUE_TIMEOUT.description: A time out value to tell the queue system how long it can run for on a task.

MAIL_SERVER.description: A mail server connection for sending emails, please change value to your own server.

MAIL_USE_TLS.description: A secure connection to your mail server. use 1 for TLS enabled, 0 for disabled.

MAIL_USERNAME.description: A username to connect to your email server

MAIL_PASSWORD.description: A password to validate your connection to your email server

MAIL_SUFFIX.description: This refers to the domain name which is used to send email onbehalf, should be the same domain as your mail server

ADMINS.description: An automated user account, which bulkops sends notification to and from

CONTACT_EMAIL.description: The contact address where bulkops delivers any message that uses the contact us button.

scripts.postdeploy: flask db init; flask db migrate;
